mapper.insert: insert into AM_QUALIFICATION_EVALUATION (ID, PERSONAL_ID, MAJOR, DEPARTMENT_OPINION, AUDIT_OPINION, REVIEW_COMMITTEE_OPINION, APPROVAL_OPINION, REMARK, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewCommitteeOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update AM_QUALIFICATION_EVALUATION set PERSONAL_ID = #{personalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT_OPINION = #{departmentOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_OPINION = #{auditOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEW_COMMITTEE_OPINION = #{reviewCommitteeOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVAL_OPINION = #{approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_DATETIME = #{deleteDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_PERSON = #{deletePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, PERSONAL_ID, MAJOR, DEPARTMENT_OPINION, AUDIT_OPINION, REVIEW_COMMITTEE_OPINION, APPROVAL_OPINION, REMARK, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON from AM_QUALIFICATION_EVALUATION where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
